content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: DeleteWorkload path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/workload/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/workloads/{workload_id} content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name workloadid
desc an edgecompute workload id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum delete a workload
responses
title: 36_Workloads_DeleteWorkload_204.json
